alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 9:58PM CDT until April 04 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR WESTERN CLAYTON COUNTY... At 957 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Strawberry Point, or 10 miles south of Elkader, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Guttenberg, Elkader, Strawberry Point, Edgewood, Garnavillo, Farmersburg, St. Olaf, Garber, Elkport, Mederville, Wood, Motor, Communia, Osborne and Littleport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
